A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall a good movie. Rey and Kylo's story gets pushed forward while I feel Finn is stuck. The Finn storyline could have been completely removed and would not have changes the outcome of the movie. Enjoyed seeing Luke again and wish his final scene ended a little differently. There is a seen with Leia which is ridiculous. Canto Bight\, hated everything about it\, use it as a bathroom break. Two things I do not want in my Star Wars movie\, kids and 15 foot tall space horses.
